Module com.example.starhike
Package Other

Class GlobalVariables

java.lang.Object
Other.GlobalVariables
public class GlobalVariables extends Object
The GlobalVariables class represents a collection of global variables used in the application. It contains static fields and methods that can be accessed throughout the entire application.
